title: Understanding Fainting -- Symptoms
author: WebMD Editorial Contributors

sections.heading: What Are the Symptoms of Fainting?
content: Depending on the cause of your fainting spell, you may have some or all of these symptoms before or during the episode:
bullets: Sensation that the room is moving
Tingling or numbness of fingertips and around lips

content_blocks.text: Depending on the cause of your fainting spell, you may have some or all of these symptoms before or during the episode:
associated_bullets: Sensation that the room is moving
Tingling or numbness of fingertips and around lips

sections.heading: Call Your Doctor About Fainting If:
content: You have an unexplained fainting episode. Especially if the episode occurs during exercise , happens during heart palpitations (feeling the heart beat irregularly), or if you have a family history of recurrent fainting or sudden death.

content_blocks.text: You have an unexplained fainting episode. Especially if the episode occurs during exercise , happens during heart palpitations (feeling the heart beat irregularly), or if you have a family history of recurrent fainting or sudden death.
